title: 07/10: McCoy News; Allen's TD Potential; Elite TE Talk (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
LeSean McCoy faces serious allegations so we talk about the BUF backfield and what might happen in the event of a suspension (2:24). Then Dave weighs in on yesterday's debate about the next Todd Gurley (7:10) and we get into the upside vs. downside debate for Rob Gronkowski, Travis Kelce and Zach Ertz (16:10). Can Ertz reach 1,000 yards this season? ... Some discussion about the MIA backfield (29:30) and a young TE with potential (32:58), then we unveil another draft strategy (34:10)! How do you feel about taking a QB and a TE early? ... Putting Keenan Allen under the microscope (42:10). We evaluate the success of Ken Whisenhunt's LAC offenses and why Allen could score more TDs this year ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
